name: filemail
description: move mails to the same folder where  previously mails have been moved for this author
author: Bernd Mielke

movemail.description: Once you have moved one mail to a specific folder the addon keeps track of the mail address of the mail author and the folder that mails get moved into. The next time you would like to move a mail to the same folder instead of  managing the the context menus and then selecting the final folder, you just hit CTRL + 'q' and its gone to the same folder.

invertSender.description: If you have users (like you) where you want to use the target email address instead of the sender email address  for selecting the folder, select once a  message from this email author and hit CTRL +  shift + 'q', then for all emails from this sender the target email will used for selecting the target folder instead of the sender email.
